name: Chaos Generator
overview: ** STORY** Synthpop band Chaos Generator just recorded their new album. But oh no! The producer has lost all of the songs. In order to get the music to the record plant, the producer has to collect all the songs! But beware of the magnets, who’s only goal is to erase all audio! Be quick, and help the producer to get the songs to the record plant! ** CREDITS ** Programmed by Stuart Collier. Cover Art, Graphics and Game Design by Trevor Storey. Music by Andrew Fisher. Tape loader source by Martin Piper. Tape mastering by Richard Bayliss. Additional packaging design by Kenz.
